name: Magma Octopus
movement: walk 40 ft., swim 60 ft. in lava
description: The Magma Octopus is a large elemental being with powerful tentacles and a fiery appearance, thriving in volcanic environments.
memorable: Its ability to grapple multiple foes and unleash devastating magma blasts makes it a significant threat.
goals: To thrive in lava and subdue prey.
relations: Often found in volcanic habitats or alongside other elemental beings.
strengths: Immune to fire damage and capable of grappling multiple enemies with its tentacles.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to cold damage when away from lava for too long.
attacks: Utilizes up to four tentacle attacks per turn, dealing bludgeoning and fire damage, and can unleash a Magma Blast area attack.
most_powerful_ability: Magma Blast, dealing high area fire damage and causing targets to potentially catch fire.
skills: Has +8 in Athletics, making it exceptionally good at grappling opponents, and +6 in Stealth, allowing it to surprise adventurers.
additional_information: Lava Bound ability allows for limited time outside of lava.
Largest in its elemental category, enhancing its physical presence.
Can grapple two targets simultaneously, making it a formidable opponent.
Ability to petrify if away from lava too long.
Sprays magma in a 30-foot cone as a powerful area attack.
test_queries: octopus creature that uses fire attacks
